description: Get the details of your linked WhatsApp Business Account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier, from Amazon Web Services, of the linked WhatsApp Business Account. WABA identifiers are formatted as waba-01234567890123456789012345678901. Use ListLinkedWhatsAppBusinessAccounts to list all WABAs and their details.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the linked WhatsApp Business Account.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the linked WhatsApp Business Account, formatted as waba-01234567890123456789012345678901.

nested_items.name: wabaId
nested_items.description: The WhatsApp Business Account ID from meta.

nested_items.name: registrationStatus
nested_items.description: The registration status of the linked WhatsApp Business Account.

nested_items.name: linkDate
nested_items.description: The date the WhatsApp Business Account was linked.

nested_items.name: wabaName
nested_items.description: The name of the linked WhatsApp Business Account.

nested_items.name: eventDestinations
nested_items.description: The event destinations for the linked WhatsApp Business Account.

nested_items.name: eventDestinationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the event destination.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to import phone numbers and write events.

nested_items.name: phoneNumbers
nested_items.description: The phone numbers associated with the Linked WhatsApp Business Account.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the phone number.

nested_items.name: phoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number associated with the Linked WhatsApp Business Account.

nested_items.name: phoneNumberId
nested_items.description: The phone number ID. Phone number identifiers are formatted as phone-number-id-01234567890123456789012345678901.

nested_items.name: metaPhoneNumberId
nested_items.description: The phone number ID from Meta.

nested_items.name: displayPhoneNumberName
nested_items.description: The display name for this phone number.

nested_items.name: displayPhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number that appears in the recipients display.

nested_items.name: qualityRating
nested_items.description: The quality rating of the phone number. This is from Meta.
